Text.p:
I have updated:
The Encounters page.
The Raid Bosses chart.
Which Pokemon can be shiny. (Scyther, Scizor, and a few I missed in the past.)

This event doesn't start until 2 April 2019, but they have made some Shopping Boxes available.
Check them out!
Also, there were a couple of minor changes to the GAME_MASTER file.
